name: R1FT
description:
Dive into the R1FT as you explore various dimensions, each with their own unique twist on the theme "One-Time Use." Each dimension has its own rules, ranging from a King Midas inspired puzzle game to an interactive experience about plastics. Will you find out what is on the other side of the R1FT?

Move with the left joystick and snap turn with the right.

Punch the glass of the Grandfather Clock to reset each puzzle

If you have the option, we recommend you play on PCVR, as the Quest 2 version is slightly less performant.
